name: Royal Game of Ur (itch) (Jon Ericson)
description:
This is a work in progress! Most of the actual game rules are not yet implemented.

This is prototype of the Royal Game of Ur. The controls are:

  • Up/Left: Cycle "up" through the list of stones.
  • Down/Right: Cycle "down"
  • X/Y: Use your roll on the selected stone

Here be dragons bugs.
